con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="CustomerService" targetNamespace="http://www.crm.org/CustomerService/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://www.crm.org/CustomerService/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.crm.org/CustomerService/"> <xsd:complexType name="AddressTyp"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="street" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="nr" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="zipcode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="city" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CustomerTyp"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="firstname" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="lastname" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="gender" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="emailAddress" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="rating" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="address" type="tns:AddressTyp"/> <xsd:element name="userdef1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="userdef2" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="userdef3" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="userdef4" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CriteriasType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="criteria" type="tns:CriteriaType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CriteriaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="criteriaField" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="criteriaValue" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CreateNewCustomer"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="customer" type="tns:CustomerTyp"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CreateNewCustomerResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="UpdateExistingCustomer"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="customer" type="tns:CustomerTyp"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="UpdateExistingCustomerResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence></xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RetrieveCustomerByCriteria"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="criterias" type="tns:CriteriasType" minOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RetrieveCustomerByCriteriaResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="customers" type="tns:CustomerTyp"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CreateNewCustomerFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CreateNewCustomerFault" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="UpdateExistingCustomerFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="UpdateExistingCustomerFault" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="CreateNewCustomerRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CreateNewCustomer"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreateNewCustomerResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CreateNewCustomerResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreateNewCustomerFault"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:CreateNewCustomerFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="UpdateExistingCustomerRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:UpdateExistingCustomer"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="UpdateExistingCustomerResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:UpdateExistingCustomerResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="UpdateExistingCustomerFault"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:UpdateExistingCustomerFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RetrieveCustomerByCriteriaRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:RetrieveCustomerByCriteria"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RetrieveCustomerByCriteriaResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:RetrieveCustomerByCriteriaResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CustomerService"> <wsdl:operation name="CreateNewCustomer"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CreateNewCustomerRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:CreateNewCustomerResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="fault" message="tns:CreateNewCustomerFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="UpdateExistingCustomer"> <wsdl:input message="tns:UpdateExistingCustomerRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:UpdateExistingCustomerResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="fault" message="tns:UpdateExistingCustomerFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="RetrieveCustomerByCriteria"> <wsdl:input message="tns:RetrieveCustomerByCriteriaRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:RetrieveCustomerByCriteriaResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CustomerServiceSOAP" type="tns:CustomerService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="CreateNewCustomer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.crm.org/CustomerService/CreateNewCustomer"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="UpdateExistingCustomer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.crm.org/CustomerService/UpdateExistingCustomer"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="RetrieveCustomerByCriteria"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.crm.org/CustomerService/RetrieveCustomerByCriteria"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CustomerService"> <wsdl:port name="CustomerServiceSOAP" binding="tns:CustomerServiceSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://soadev:8088/mockCustomerServiceSOAP"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
